string-array.name: information
string-array.item: "The ideal amount of sleep cycles for adults are 5–7 cycles"
"The ideal amount of sleep cycles for teens are 6–7 cycles"
"The average duration of a single sleep cycle is 90 minutes"
"It takes approximately 14 minutes to fall asleep for a human being"
"Adjust the time it takes for you to fall asleep in "Settings""
"You can create a Reminder Alarm after setting an alarm in Awake By/Sleep By"
